definition: to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: We embark at Montreal for New York.
sentences.chinese: 我们在蒙特利尔上船去纽约。

sentences.english: For shipment destined to Ottawa, On, it should be booked upto Montreal CY.
sentences.chinese: 从蒙特利尔货场运道渥太华的运输，应该先预定好。

sentences.english: Chlorofluorocarbons were regulated under the Montreal Protocol starting in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 根据蒙特利尔议定书规定氯氟烃在1987年开始。

sentences.english: This is Peter Paul Biro, who lives in Montréal.
sentences.chinese: 这是彼得保罗比罗，住在蒙特利尔。

sentences.english: They say Montreal is the most exciting city in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 他们说蒙特利尔是加拿大最令人兴奋的城市。

sentences.english: Montréal is a modern city in every regard.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特利尔是一个现代化的城市在各个方面。

sentences.english: To Dr. Bethune, Montreal is indeed a special place.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特利尔对白求恩来说是个特别的地方。

sentences.english: I'd been to Montreal maybe twice before.
sentences.chinese: 我以前大概去过蒙特利尔两次。

sentences.english: The Montreal skyline as seen from Mont Royal.
sentences.chinese: 从皇家山上看到的蒙特利尔。

sentences.english: In 1775, during the American Revolution, US forces captured Montreal.
sentences.chinese: 在1775年，美国革命期间，美军夺取了蒙特利尔。

sentences.english: The Montreal Muslim Taekwondo team was able to compete again.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特利尔穆斯林跆拳道队能够再次竞争。

sentences.english: I have arrived in LA and am halfway through my 10 hour wait until I get the flight to Chicago and then to Montreal.
sentences.chinese: 我现到了洛杉矶，我会转道芝加哥回到蒙特利尔。

sentences.english: We'd love to tag in Monterey.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢在蒙特利尔放标签。

sentences.english: Historic Old Montréal features charming cobblestone streets and some of the city's most historic buildings.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特利尔特旧城中富有特色的的圆石街道和古老建筑。

sentences.english: Lou Bailiang had undertaken postdoctoral research in Montreal University in Canada since 1990.
sentences.chinese: 1990年赴加拿大蒙特利尔大学进行博士后研究。

sentences.english: ReseautageQuebec. net - A professional social network based in Montreal.
sentences.chinese: 是个位于蒙特利尔的专业社交网络。

definition: Calgary, largest city of Alberta, Canada
Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia
Quebec city, capital of Quebec province of Canada
Perth, capital of Western Australia/also written 帕斯
